channel.title: Banned from mitb IRC?
channel.description:
I just got a notification that I've been banned from the server:
(5:37:02 PM) mitb2.moparisthebest.com: (notice) *** You are banned from moparisthebest (Temporary idle (not in any channel) AKILL.)
Was this a mistake? Because I wasn't even in a channel at the time, and I haven't done anything to be banned.

item.title: Banned from mitb IRC?
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

It wont stay there for to long, i was banned for being a douche and was unbanned in a few days.

Read full topic

item.title: Banned from mitb IRC?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:2, topic:344945”]Some botnet came along so Mopman set the server to akill anyone that isn’t in a channel.
Basically, you should join a channel at joining the server to prevent being killed.[/quote]Ye, there was a notification afterwords that let me know, thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Banned from mitb IRC?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Some botnet came along so Mopman set the server to akill anyone that isn’t in a channel.
Basically, you should join a channel at joining the server to prevent being killed.

Read full topic
